briefTitle: The Effect of Simulation-Based Breast Health Education on Breast Cancer Awareness and Breast Self-Examination Practices
officialTitle: The Effect of Simulation-Based Breast Health Education on Breast Cancer Awareness and Breast Self-Examination Practices of Afgan Refugee Women: A Randomized Control Trial
conditions: Breast Cancer, Health Knowledge, Attitudes, Practice
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The Breast Cancer Awareness Measure Score
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* 20-65 years,
* must be able to speak Turkish or Dari.

Exclusion Criteria:

* breast cancer
